newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius sells $46.50 million of T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius sells $46.50 million of T-bills.

text.p: The central Bank of Mauritius sold all 950 million rupees ($46.50 million) of T-bills it offered for auction on Thursday, the bank said.
The central bank sold 201.5 million rupees of 91-day bills at a weighted average yield of 10.24 percent compared to 195.7 million rupees at 10.24 percent last week.

The bank sold 335.2 million rupees of 182-day bills with an average yield of 10.49 percent against 141.0 million rupees at 10.58 percent last week. It sold 413.3 million rupees of 364-day bills at an average yield of 10.46 percent against 513.3 million rupees at 10.56 percent last week.
This week's effective bank rate was posted at 10.42 percent per annum from 10.49 percent last week, the bank said.
